mapper.select: SELECT sqdbh,fs.sbxlh AS sbxlh,fwlx,sj.sbmc AS sbmc,sj.sbys AS sbys,sj.sblx AS sblx,sj.sbxh AS sbxh,khsfid,khsid,khqid,khxxdz,sbwtms,dz1.zslymc AS zslymc1,dz2.zslymc AS zslymc2,dz3.zslymc AS zslymc3,gcui.yhxm AS gcsdm,adui.yhxm AS glydm,fs.jddm AS jddm,df.jdmc AS jdmc FROM fwsqd fs LEFT JOIN dm_fwjd df ON df.jddm=fs.jddm LEFT JOIN sbjbxx sj ON sj.sbxlh=fs.sbxlh LEFT JOIN dm_zsly dz1 ON dz1.zslydm=fs.zslydm1 LEFT JOIN dm_zsly dz2 ON dz2.zslydm=fs.zslydm2 LEFT JOIN dm_zsly dz3 ON dz3.zslydm=fs.zslydm3 LEFT JOIN userinfo gcui ON gcui.yhdm = fs.gcsdm LEFT JOIN userinfo adui ON adui.yhdm = fs.glydm WHERE fs.jddm IN ("1","2","3")
mapper.update: UPDATE fwsqd SET jddm=#{jddm} WHERE sqdbh=#{sqdbh}
mapper.select: SELECT provinceid AS id,provincename AS name FROM s_province
